# Botzat_et_al_2016

Alexandra Botzat, Leonie K. Fischer, Ingo Kowarik (2016) Unexploited opportunities in understanding liveable and biodiverse cities. A review on urban biodiversity perception and valuation. Global Environmental Change. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.gloenvcha.2016.04.008.

---

Keywords: [Green infrastructure](../topics/GreenInfrastructure.qmd), [green space](../topics/GreenSpace.qmd), [biodiversity](../topics/Biodiversity.qmd), perceptions, [methods](../topics/Methods.qmd)

Systematic review to assess perception across climatic zones, spread of urban greenspaces assessed, scales of biodiversity assessed, and diversity of populations.  

Streetscapes 3rd most prevalent greenspace type studied. Overall, large traditional greenspaces are the most studied. 

Diversity of urban residents is understudied
